name: One Million Dollar Ganster
description:
One Million Dollar Gangster is a 4 players coop/competitive game.

Four gangsters rob the bank of a self-centered billionaire. They will have to work together to climb all the floors of this bank. But which one will go first at $ 1 million?

Blue Dog :

Crespel Alexandre - Producer / Game Designer / UI Designer
Taoufik Maxime - Gameplay Programmer
Broussaud Gaspard - Sound Designer / UI Programmer
Bertrand Nicolas - Level Designer / Game Designer

Players : 4 players Splitscreen / Online with Parsec
Language : English
Platforme : PC
Engine : Unreal Engine 4
